attributes.additional_details: Pakistanis across the globe and in the UK have been registering thousands of complaints with the Scotland Yard MET police for this person, having 3576 cases registered against him in Pakistan including charges of murder and extortion, to be trailed for terrorizing and threatening to kill innocent people who were protesting peacefully in Karachi, Pakistan, on the 12th of May 2013, against rigging in recent Pakistani General Elections via a live address from UK. We demand an explanation from the UK Home Office as to why its resident has been spearheading this terrorist campaign from UK targeting the people in Pakistan. Previous concerns over this have been addressed by George Holloway (Member Parliament).
